rdfs:label: PPM Schema - OAA v5.0.0
rdfs:comment: Portfolio-Programme-Project Management ontology for initiative tracking and value realisation

entities.rdfs:label: Portfolio
entities.rdfs:comment: Collection of programmes delivering strategic vision within investment envelope
entities.oaa:description: A portfolio represents the highest level of organisational investment management, grouping related programmes under a unified strategic vision and governance structure with defined investment boundaries.

entities.rdfs:label: Programme
entities.rdfs:comment: Coherent set of initiatives delivering programme benefits aligned to strategic pillar
entities.oaa:description: A programme coordinates multiple related initiatives to deliver transformational benefits that align with organisational strategic pillars, managing cross-initiative dependencies and shared resources.

entities.rdfs:label: Initiative
entities.rdfs:comment: Discrete transformation initiative with defined outcomes and dependencies
entities.oaa:description: An initiative is an individual transformation effort with clearly defined scope, outcomes, timeline, and resource requirements that contributes to programme-level benefits realisation.

entities.rdfs:label: Dependency
entities.rdfs:comment: Typed relationship between initiatives defining sequencing and enablement
entities.oaa:description: A dependency captures the logical or temporal relationship between initiatives, specifying how one initiative enables, blocks, or influences another within the delivery schedule.

entities.rdfs:label: Milestone
entities.rdfs:comment: Significant achievement point within an initiative delivery timeline
entities.oaa:description: A milestone marks a significant checkpoint or deliverable within an initiative, used for progress tracking, governance reviews, and stakeholder communication.

entities.rdfs:label: Practice Area
entities.rdfs:comment: Business unit or advisory practice contributing to transformation
entities.oaa:description: A practice area represents an organisational unit, business function, or advisory domain that participates in or benefits from transformation initiatives.

entities.rdfs:label: Benefit Metric
entities.rdfs:comment: Quantified benefit measurement with baseline and target values
entities.oaa:description: A benefit metric defines a measurable indicator of value realisation, including baseline measurements, target values, measurement methodology, and tracking frequency.

entities.rdfs:label: Risk
entities.rdfs:comment: Identified risk to initiative delivery with probability and impact
entities.oaa:description: A risk captures a potential threat to initiative or programme success, including probability assessment, impact analysis, mitigation strategies, and ownership assignment.

entities.rdfs:label: Phase
entities.rdfs:comment: Temporal phases for initiative scheduling across planning horizon
entities.oaa:description: Phase provides a controlled vocabulary for temporal planning periods used to schedule initiatives across the strategic planning horizon.

entities.rdfs:label: Initiative Status
entities.rdfs:comment: Lifecycle status values for tracking initiative progress
entities.oaa:description: Initiative Status defines the controlled vocabulary for lifecycle states an initiative progresses through from inception to closure.

entities.rdfs:label: Priority
entities.rdfs:comment: Priority classification levels for resource allocation decisions
entities.oaa:description: Priority provides a controlled vocabulary for classifying initiatives by importance to inform resource allocation and sequencing decisions.

entities.rdfs:label: Dependency Type
entities.oaa:description: Dependency Type defines the controlled vocabulary for categorising the nature of relationships between dependent initiatives.

relationships.rdfs:label: programmes
relationships.oaa:description: Links a portfolio to its constituent programmes that collectively deliver the portfolio's strategic objectives.

relationships.rdfs:label: initiatives
relationships.oaa:description: Links a programme to its constituent initiatives that collectively deliver the programme's benefits.

relationships.rdfs:label: parentPortfolio
relationships.oaa:description: Links a programme to its parent portfolio for governance and investment tracking.

relationships.rdfs:label: parentProgramme
relationships.oaa:description: Links an initiative to its parent programme for benefits alignment and coordination.

relationships.rdfs:label: dependencies
relationships.rdfs:comment: Dependencies this initiative has on others
relationships.oaa:description: Links an initiative to its dependency records that specify relationships with other initiatives.

relationships.rdfs:label: fromInitiative
relationships.oaa:description: Identifies the source initiative that provides an input, enabler, or constraint in a dependency relationship.

relationships.rdfs:label: toInitiative
relationships.oaa:description: Identifies the target initiative that receives or depends on the output of the predecessor initiative.

relationships.rdfs:label: milestones
relationships.oaa:description: Links an initiative to its key milestones for progress tracking and governance.

relationships.rdfs:label: parentInitiative
relationships.oaa:description: Links a milestone back to its parent initiative for context and ownership.

relationships.rdfs:label: practiceArea
relationships.rdfs:comment: Primary practice area benefiting from initiative
relationships.oaa:description: Links an initiative to the primary business unit or practice that will benefit from its outcomes.

relationships.rdfs:label: initiativesServed
relationships.rdfs:comment: Initiatives that benefit this practice area
relationships.oaa:description: Links a practice area to the initiatives that deliver value or capability to it.

relationships.rdfs:label: risks
relationships.oaa:description: Links an initiative to its identified risks for proactive management and mitigation.

relationships.rdfs:label: affectedInitiative
relationships.oaa:description: Links a risk back to the initiative it threatens for context and ownership.

relationships.rdfs:label: benefitMetrics
relationships.rdfs:comment: Benefit metrics tracked for this programme
relationships.oaa:description: Links a programme to the quantified benefit metrics used to measure value realisation.

relationships.rdfs:label: parentProgrammeMetric
relationships.rdfs:comment: Programme this benefit metric belongs to
relationships.oaa:description: Links a benefit metric back to its parent programme for alignment and reporting.

relationships.rdfs:label: phase
relationships.oaa:description: Links an initiative to its planned delivery phase within the strategic planning horizon.

relationships.rdfs:label: status
relationships.oaa:description: Links an initiative or milestone to its current lifecycle status for progress tracking.

relationships.rdfs:label: priority
relationships.oaa:description: Links an initiative to its priority classification for resource allocation decisions.

relationships.rdfs:label: dependencyType
relationships.oaa:description: Links a dependency to its type classification from the controlled vocabulary.
